sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(j \neq k \) and also \(j : k \) is the duplicate ratio of \((j + l )\), and \((k + l )\). Then prove that the number \(l \) is the mean proportional between \(j \), and \(k \). 
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
It is given that}$$ 
\[
	\frac{j }{k } = \frac{(j + l )^2 }{(k + l )^2 }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow j (\input[s2v1]{} + l )^2 = k (\input[s2v2]{} + l )^2
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	j (\input[s3v1]{} ^2 + l ^2 + 2kl ) = k (j ^2 + l ^2 + 2jl )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow jk ^2 + jl ^2 = \input[s3v2]{} ^2 k + kl ^2 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
\[
	\Rightarrow jl ^2 - k\input[s4v1]{} ^2 - j ^2 k + j\input[s4v2]{} ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow l ^2(\input[s5v1]{} - k ) - j\input[s5v2]{} (k - ) = 0
\]
\[
	(l ^2 - jk )(j - k ) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Since we are already given that $j \neq k $, we can write that}$$
\[
	l ^2 - j\input[s6v1]{} = 0
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow l = \sqrt{\input[s6v2]{}k }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
So, we can write that $l $ is the mean proportion of the two numbers $j $, and $k $.

Hence proved.
\newline
}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": ["k", "j"], "text": "$$\text{Upon cross-multiplication of the above equation we get $j (k + l )^2 = k (j + l )^2$.}$$"}, {"data": ["k", "j"], "text": "$$\text{Upon opening the brackets and cancelling the common terms from both sides we get $jk ^2 + jl ^2 = j ^2 k + kl ^2$}$$"}, {"data": ["l", "k"], "text": "$$\text{Brnging all the terms on the LHS we get $jl ^2 - kl ^2 - j ^2 k + jk ^2 = 0$}$$"}, {"data": ["j", "k"], "text": "$$\text{Upon factorizing the aove equation we get $(l ^2 - jk )(j - k ) = 0$}$$"}, {"data": ["k", "j"], "text": "$$\text{Since $j \neq k $, we can equate $l ^2 - jk = 0$, resulting in $l = \sqrt{jk }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
